name: @vhl/my_component
description: A sub-navigation component used in various activities.

scripts.build:dev: npm run lint && npx tsc && npx webpack --mode development --env entryPath=./src/my_component.js --env outputDir=./sandbox/public/assets/bundle --env name=my_component
scripts.build:dist: npm run lint && npx tsc && npm test && npx webpack --mode production --env entryPath=./src/my_component.js --env outputDir=./dist --env name=my_component && npm run build:types:dist
scripts.build:test: npm run lint && npx tsc && npx webpack --mode development --env entryPath=./src/my_component.js --env outputDir=./spec/fixtures/assets/bundle --env name=my_component

author: Vista Higher Learning
